recipe.name: Pumpkin Swirl Cheesecake (2022 Version)
recipe.instructions:
1. For crust, in a medium mixing bowl combine crushed gingersnaps, melted butter, and the 1 tablespoon flour. Press into the bottom of an 8-inch springform pan. Bake for 10 minutes. Allow to cool.
2. For filling, in a large mixing bowl beat cream cheese until smooth. Add sugar, the 6 tablespoons flour, ginger, and vanilla; beat on high speed until smooth. Add eggs all at once. Beat on low speed just until combined. Stir in milk. Measure 4 cups of filling; set aside. To remaining mixture add pumpkin, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spice. - 3. Spoon pumpkin mixture into crust-lined springform pan. Carefully spoon the plain cheese mixture over pumpkin mixture. Use a spatula to gently swirl batters, being careful not to disturb crust. Place the springform pan on a shallow baking pan on the oven rack.
4. Bake at 375 degrees F. for 50 minutes+ in an 9-inch pan, or until center appears nearly set when shaken. NOTE: The filling puffed up over the rim of an 8-inch pan while baking in 2022, but was not cooked completely after 55 minutes. It got too brown once it was fully cooked.
5. Remove springform pan from baking pan. Cool cheesecake on a wire rack for 15 minutes. Use a small metal spatula to loosen crust from sides of pan. Cool 30 minutes more. Remove sides of the springform pan. Cool for 1 hour; cover and chill at least 4 hours. Makes 12 to 16 servings.
